alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 31 at 8:12PM CDT until November 01 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas, northeast Louisiana southwestern, central, south-central and southeastern Mississippi. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
